item.title: Analysing A Docs As Code Pipeline
item.description: The Hemingway Editor says that sentence is: hard to read (yellow highlight), and; uses passive voice (green highlight). As an noob writer, I frequently make those mistakes, so that kind of feedback really helps me.

item.title: Docs-as-code Build Pipeline Explained: From Crazy to Consistent
item.description: Here’s an example docs-as-code build pipeline. It describes a process for checking and testing documentation written in markdown format. After committing and pushing markdown changes to Github, the pipeline will run.
